reviews.title: Divine Experience
reviews.text: The spiritual atmosphere here is unmatched. The evening aarti is a must-see. Be prepared for long queues during peak season, but completely worth it.

reviews.title: Crowded but Beautiful
reviews.text: Beautiful temple with rich history. The crowd management could be better. Try to visit early morning for a peaceful experience.

reviews.title: Architectural Marvel
reviews.text: The intricate carvings are mindblowing. Hire a guide to understand the history and symbolism. The nearby beach is perfect for sunset.

reviews.title: Must Visit UNESCO Site
reviews.text: Visited during the Konark Dance Festival - what an amazing experience! The temple at dawn is magical. Carry water and sunscreen.

reviews.title: Bird Lover's Paradise
reviews.text: Saw Irrawaddy dolphins and thousands of migratory birds! Best experience in December. Book the boat early in the morning for bird watching.

reviews.title: Serene Lake Experience
reviews.text: The boat ride was peaceful and scenic. Nalabana Island is beautiful. Carry binoculars if you're into birdwatching.

reviews.title: Wildlife Heaven
reviews.text: Spotted a tiger on our second safari! The waterfalls inside the park are breathtaking. Book permits well in advance.

reviews.title: Peaceful Beach Getaway
reviews.text: Less crowded than Puri. Perfect for a quiet weekend. The lighthouse view is lovely. Seafood here is fresh and delicious!

reviews.title: Historical Treasure
reviews.text: Ancient Jain caves with beautiful carvings. Some climbing required - wear comfortable shoes. The hilltop view of Bhubaneswar is great!
